items.content_html: MicroLib is a lightweight API framework built on Node.js that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process. The idea is to eliminate or ameliorate the "microservices premium" and the trade-off between deployment independence and operational complexity.
items.title: module-federation/MicroLib: MicroLib is a lightweight API framework built on Node.js that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process.  The idea is to eliminate or ameliorate  the "microservices premium" and the trade-off between deployment independence and operational complexity.

items.content_html: Hangar Export is a Chrome Extension that will help you extract your Pledge and Buyback data from the Star Citizen Robert Space Industries Hanger website. It tries to be as lightweight, unobtrusive, and auditable as possible. Use the JSON file to load your pledge data into https://hangar.link
